Welcome to DataQA’s documentation!¶

Documentation of the DataQA package which contains functionality to perform quality assessment of APERTIF data processed by Apercal

Contents:

  • Crosscal QA
    • Module: crosscal
    • Script: run_ccal_plots
  • Continuum and Mosaic QA
    • Module: qa_continuum
    • Script: run_continuum_validation
    • (Deprecated) Script: make_mosaic_image
  • Line QA
    • Module: line_cube_stats
    • (Deprecated) Script: subtract_continuum
    • Script: run_cube_stats
  • Selfcal QA
    • Module: selfcal_maps
    • Module: selfcal_plots
    • Script: run_scal_plots
  • Oveview Report
    • Module: Pipeline_Run_Time
    • Module: HTML_Report_Content
    • Module: HTML_Report_Dir
    • Module: HTML_Report
    • Script: create_report
  • Automated Pipeline QA
    • Script: run_qa
